nodes.text: Jomun Litas was a male Human who lived on the planet Alderaan during the Alderaan Civil War, and was welcome on the estate of the reconstituted Sith Empire-allied House Thul.

Litas appeared in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic, released by BioWare in 2011, as an Equipment Commendations Vendor for Imperial players on Alderaan. With the release of Game Update 4.0 on October 20, 2015, Jomun Litas was removed from the game along with the rest of the Equipment Commendations Vendors. His position is also marked on a map in Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide, a game guide released by Prima Games, which labeled him as "Jomun Litas."
